# Course Material

We will cover the following topics:

(<span style="color: red; font-weight: bold;">Note:</span> Some of the material will be updated/expanded as we move through the semester.  Some of the topics at the end of the semester are tentative.)

0. [Introduction to R](introduction_to_R.html)

1. [Linear Regression](01_linear_regression.html)

2. [Inference/Hypothesis Testing](02_hypothesis_testing.html)

3. [Resampling Methods](03_resampling_methods.html)

4. [Introduction to Nonlinear Models](04_nonlinear_models.html)

5. [Alternative Approaches to Causal Inference](05_alternative_causal_inference.html)

6. [Panel Data Approaches to Causal Inference](06_panel_data_causal_inference.html)

7. If we have time, an introduction to [Generalized Method of Moments]

8. If we have time, an introduction to [Quantile Regression]

9. If we have time, an introduction to [Nonparametric Regression]
